meanings.definition: Give official permission or approval for (something)
meanings.sent1: The teacher is authorizing the students to go on a field trip.
meanings.sent2: The manager is authorizing the purchase of new equipment for the office.
meanings.sent3: The principal is authorizing a pizza party for the entire school.
meanings.sent4: The judge is authorizing the release of new evidence in the case.
meanings.sent5: The government is authorizing the construction of a new bridge.

meanings.definition: To grant power or authority to (someone)
meanings.sent1: The king is authorizing his knights to defend the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The board is authorizing the CEO to make important decisions.
meanings.sent3: The superhero is authorizing his sidekick to use special powers.
meanings.sent4: The president is authorizing the general to lead the military operation.
meanings.sent5: The coach is authorizing the captain to make strategic plays.
